00012     SimpleProcessFilterMessenger::SimpleProcessFilterMessenger(SimpleProcessFilter* filter) :
00013         UserActionPluginMessenger(filter), filter_(filter) {
00014 
00015             processCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "process").c_str(), this};
00016             processCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00017                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00018             processCmd_->SetGuidance("The process to filter on."); 
00019 
00020             parentIDCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "parent_id").c_str(), this};
00021             parentIDCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00022                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00023             parentIDCmd_->SetGuidance("Parent ID of the particle to which the filter will be applied to."); 
00024 
00025             trackIDCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "track_id").c_str(), this};
00026             trackIDCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00027                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00028             trackIDCmd_->SetGuidance("Track ID of the particle to which the filter will be applied to."); 
00029 
00030             pdgIDCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "pdg_id").c_str(), this};
00031             pdgIDCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00032                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00033             pdgIDCmd_->SetGuidance("PDG ID of the particle to which the filter will be applied to."); 
00034 
00035             volumeCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "volume").c_str(), this};
00036             volumeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00037                                            G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00038             volumeCmd_->SetGuidance("Volume to apply the filter to.");     
00039     }

00041     SimpleProcessFilterMessenger::~SimpleProcessFilterMessenger() {
00042         delete processCmd_; 
00043         delete parentIDCmd_;
00044         delete trackIDCmd_;
00045         delete pdgIDCmd_;
00046         delete volumeCmd_; 
00047     }
00048 
00049     void SimpleProcessFilterMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValue) {
00050         
00051         if (command == volumeCmd_) {
00052             filter_->setVolume(newValue);
00053         } else if (command == processCmd_) { 
00054             filter_->setProcess(newValue);   
00055         } else if (command == parentIDCmd_)  {
00056             filter_->setParentID(G4UIcommand::ConvertToInt(newValue));
00057         } else if (command == trackIDCmd_)  {
00058             filter_->setTrackID(G4UIcommand::ConvertToInt(newValue));
00059         } else if (command == pdgIDCmd_)  {
00060             filter_->setPdgID(G4UIcommand::ConvertToInt(newValue));
00061         }
00062     }
